text:
Hotel ini terletak di pusat kota Surabaya, memiliki  berbagai fasilitas entertainment yang lengkap. Bisa dibilang hotel ini, hotel entertainment pertama di Surabaya yang menghadirkan berbagai fasilitas seperti resto, karaoke , pub , skylounge, spa, gym dan yang lainnya. Untuk sekarang ini, ada beberapa fasilitas yang belum dibuka mengingat masih dalam keadaan ppkm.

Dan yang gak bisa dipungkiri hotel ini, punya city view dan sunset oke di Surabaya. Bisa menikmatinya di Skylounge 147, di lantai 20.  Begitupun gak beda jauh dengan suasana di kamarnya, dengan jendela yang besar membuat lega pas menikmati city view 180° dan sunset yang keren meski di kamar aja. Rekomended banget 

Fasilitas keren, lengkap , staff nya juga friendly dan helpfull. Terima kasih buat pak Adam, mbak Evi , mbak Emil dan mas Abdul buat bantuannya.

text:
The view was beautiful, and the staffs were friendly, especially Linda who was very helpful. 

We ordered Bruschetta and mushroom soup as a starter. Then cocktail and fresh juice.

We feel like we got scammed, as the Bruschetta doesn't look or taste like a real Bruschetta. Even in the menu book, they put real Bruschetta picture. It's far away from Bruschetta, it was only small pieces of toast topped with iceberg lettuce and mayo then a small slice of cherry tomato. 

When we talked with the manager, he said that is the Bruschetta standard in the hotel. I was like, dude.... It's 4 star hotel. 
It's not even using French bread 😂 . Why can't you name it mini toast or canape? 

The mushroom soup was too salty for both of us, the cocktail was far away from the one we ordered in different places before. 

Overall, the sky lounge of this hotel is too PRICEY considering the quality of their food. 
We have spent Rp. 350.000 for fake Bruschetta, mushroom soup, a cocktail and 2 fresh juices. 

I wouldn't recommend anyone to come here. Unless you just want to get a nice sunset view but only order mineral water.
title: Fake Bruschetta

title: Nice place for chillin

text:
Staying in this hotel for two nights was great experience. Even though my standard room is not spacious but it was enough for solo traveler like me. My room has a city views which was so nice to see the city scene from my bed at day or night.
The location was in the heart of the city,  close to tunjungan street where you can find many cafes and street foods there, also the historical hotel yamato or oranje. Alun-alun kota, the center of arts, it was also walking distance from this hotel.
For breakfast, it was a buffet style and the taste is fine with me. Various foods and drinks as well as snack and dessert are provided in the table.
This hotel also has swimming pool and rooftop but I don't have chance to try it, maybe next time!
The staff were friendly to me and they helped me to send my jacket that was accidentally left when I checked out.
Thank you for the hospitality, I definitely will stay in this hotel again when I come to Surabaya next time.
title: Affordable price in the heart of the city
